mn15:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
mn15:1.3_0: Tatra kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn15:1.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosuṁ.
mn15:2.2_0: ‘vadantu maṁ āyasmanto, vacanīyomhi āyasmantehī’ti, so ca hoti dubbaco,
mn15:2.2_3: atha kho naṁ sabrahmacārī na ceva vattabbaṁ maññanti,
mn15:2.2_5: na ca tasmiṁ puggale vissāsaṁ āpajjitabbaṁ maññanti.
mn15:3.12_0: Yaṁpāvuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu upanāhī—
mn15:3.17_1: bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā.
mn15:3.18_1: bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā—
mn15:3.29_1: bhikkhu codito codakena aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati, bahiddhā kathaṁ apanāmeti,
mn15:3.30_1: bhikkhu codito codakena aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati, bahiddhā kathaṁ apanāmeti,
mn15:3.32_1: bhikkhu codito codakena apadāne na sampāyati.
mn15:3.33_1: bhikkhu codito codakena apadāne na sampāyati—
mn15:3.35_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu makkhī hoti paḷāsī.
mn15:3.38_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu issukī hoti maccharī.
mn15:3.41_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu saṭho hoti māyāvī.
mn15:3.44_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu thaddho hoti atimānī.
mn15:4.2_0: ‘vadantu maṁ āyasmanto, vacanīyomhi āyasmantehī’ti, so ca hoti suvaco,
mn15:4.2_3: atha kho naṁ sabrahmacārī vattabbañceva maññanti, anusāsitabbañca maññanti,
mn15:5.3_1: bhikkhu na pāpiccho hoti na pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṁ gato—
mn15:5.8_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhābhibhūto.
mn15:5.9_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhābhibhūto—
mn15:5.11_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu upanāhī.
mn15:5.12_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu upanāhī—
mn15:5.14_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu abhisaṅgī.
mn15:5.15_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu abhisaṅgī—
mn15:5.17_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā.
mn15:5.18_1: bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā—
mn15:5.23_1: bhikkhu codito codakena codakaṁ na apasādeti.
mn15:5.24_1: bhikkhu codito codakena codakaṁ na apasādeti—
mn15:5.26_1: bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa na paccāropeti.
mn15:5.27_1: bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa na paccāropeti—
mn15:5.29_1: bhikkhu codito codakena na aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati,
mn15:5.30_1: bhikkhu codito codakena na aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati,
mn15:5.35_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu amakkhī hoti apaḷāsī.
mn15:5.41_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu asaṭho hoti amāyāvī.
mn15:6.3_0: ahañceva kho panassaṁ pāpiccho pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṁ gato,
mn15:6.4_2: na pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṁ gato’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.10_1: bhikkhunā ‘na kodhano bhavissāmi na kodhābhibhūto’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.12_0: ahañceva kho panassaṁ kodhano kodhahetu upanāhī,
mn15:6.13_1: bhikkhunā ‘na kodhano bhavissāmi na kodhahetu upanāhī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.15_0: ahañceva kho panassaṁ kodhano kodhahetu abhisaṅgī,
mn15:6.16_1: bhikkhunā ‘na kodhano bhavissāmi na kodhahetu abhisaṅgī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.17_0: ‘Yo khvāyaṁ puggalo kodhano kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā,
mn15:6.18_0: ahañceva kho panassaṁ kodhano kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā,
mn15:6.19_1: bhikkhunā ‘na kodhano bhavissāmi na kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāressāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.20_0: ‘Yo khvāyaṁ puggalo codito codakena codakaṁ paṭippharati,
mn15:6.21_0: ahañceva kho pana codito codakena codakaṁ paṭipphareyyaṁ,
mn15:6.22_1: bhikkhunā ‘codito codakena codakaṁ nappaṭippharissāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.23_0: ‘Yo khvāyaṁ puggalo codito codakena codakaṁ apasādeti,
mn15:6.24_0: ahañceva kho pana codito codakena codakaṁ apasādeyyaṁ,
mn15:6.25_1: bhikkhunā ‘codito codakena codakaṁ na apasādessāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.26_0: ‘Yo khvāyaṁ puggalo codito codakena codakassa paccāropeti,
mn15:6.27_0: ahañceva kho pana codito codakena codakassa paccāropeyyaṁ,
mn15:6.28_1: bhikkhunā ‘codito codakena codakassa na paccāropessāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.29_0: ‘Yo khvāyaṁ puggalo codito codakena aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati, bahiddhā kathaṁ apanāmeti,
mn15:6.30_0: ahañceva kho pana codito codakena aññenaññaṁ paṭicareyyaṁ, bahiddhā kathaṁ apanāmeyyaṁ,
mn15:6.31_3: na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarissāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.32_0: ‘Yo khvāyaṁ puggalo codito codakena apadāne na sampāyati,
mn15:6.33_0: ahañceva kho pana codito codakena apadāne na sampāyeyyaṁ,
mn15:6.34_1: bhikkhunā ‘codito codakena apadāne sampāyissāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:6.48_0: ahañceva kho panassaṁ sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī ādhānaggāhī duppaṭinissaggī,
mn15:6.49_1: bhikkhunā ‘asandiṭṭhiparāmāsī bhavissāmi anādhānaggāhī suppaṭinissaggī’ti cittaṁ uppādetabbaṁ.
mn15:7.3_0: Sace, āvuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
mn15:7.4_2: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.6_1: na pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṁ gato’ti, tenāvuso,
mn15:7.6_2: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.9_0: Sace, āvuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
mn15:7.10_1: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.12_1: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.

mn15:7.16_1: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.18_1: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.21_1: bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti ‘kodhano khomhi kodhahetu upanāhī’ti, tenāvuso,
mn15:7.21_2: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.22_1: bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti ‘na khomhi kodhano kodhahetu upanāhī’ti, tenāvuso,
mn15:7.22_2: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.

mn15:7.26_1: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.28_1: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.30_0: ‘kiṁ nu khomhi kodhano kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā’ti?
mn15:7.31_0: Sace, āvuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
mn15:7.32_1: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.34_0: ‘na khomhi kodhano kodhasāmantā vācaṁ nicchāretā’ti, tenāvuso,
mn15:7.34_1: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.36_0: ‘kiṁ nu khomhi codito codakena codakaṁ paṭippharāmī’ti?
mn15:7.37_1: bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti ‘codito khomhi codakena codakaṁ paṭippharāmī’ti, tenāvuso,
mn15:7.37_2: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.39_1: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.41_0: ‘kiṁ nu khomhi codito codakena codakaṁ apasādemī’ti?
mn15:7.42_1: bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti ‘codito khomhi codakena codakaṁ apasādemī’ti, tenāvuso,
mn15:7.42_2: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:7.44_0: ‘codito khomhi codakena codakaṁ na apasādemī’ti, tenāvuso,
mn15:7.44_1: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.46_0: ‘kiṁ nu khomhi codito codakena codakassa paccāropemī’ti?
mn15:7.47_0: Sace, āvuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṁ jānāti:
mn15:7.48_1: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.

mn15:7.50_1: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.52_0: ‘kiṁ nu khomhi codito codakena aññenaññaṁ paṭicarāmi, bahiddhā kathaṁ apanāmemi,

mn15:7.54_2: bhikkhunā tesaṁyeva pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.

mn15:7.56_3: bhikkhunā teneva pītipāmojjena vihātabbaṁ ahorattānusikkhinā kusalesu dhammesu.

mn15:7.60_0: ‘codito khomhi codakena apadāne na sampāyāmī’ti, tenāvuso,

mn15:8.1_1: bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno sabbepime pāpake akusale dhamme appahīne attani samanupassati, tenāvuso,
mn15:8.1_2: bhikkhunā sabbesaṁyeva imesaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:8.2_1: bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno sabbepime pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne attani samanupassati, tenāvuso,
mn15:8.3_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, itthī vā puriso vā, daharo yuvā maṇḍanajātiko,
mn15:8.3_1: ādāse vā parisuddhe pariyodāte, acche vā udakapatte,
mn15:8.3_3: sace tattha passati rajaṁ vā aṅgaṇaṁ vā,
mn15:8.3_4: tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamati;
mn15:8.4_0: no ce tattha passati rajaṁ vā aṅgaṇaṁ vā, teneva attamano hoti:
mn15:8.6_1: sace bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno sabbepime pāpake akusale dhamme appahīne attani samanupassati, tenāvuso,
mn15:8.6_2: bhikkhunā sabbesaṁyeva imesaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṁ.
mn15:8.7_1: bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno sabbepime pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne attani samanupassati, tenāvuso,
mn15:8.9_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
